overview: Lety, a beautiful young woman, has an extremely jealous nature that is irritating her handsome, easy-going fianc√©, Joaquin, Lety enlists her friend Martha to try and trap Joaquin. Joaquin, annoyed at Lety's attempt to catch him, decides to teach her a lesson, and disappears. Panicked, Lety tries to find him and realizes that she had the perfect man all along.
title: El hombre perfecto
